title: Tour of Flanders and the Birth of the Modern-Era’s Cobblestone Climber
content:
Twenty years ago, the Tour of Flanders was all about brawn over brain, but not now. Jeremy Whittle explores a race that's now just as much about climbing skills and tech gains.

Read the full article at Tour of Flanders and the Birth of the Modern-Era’s Cobblestone Climber on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
